title: Iran Holds Exercises in Strait of Hormuz After Trump Threatens Military Action
summary_full: The day before nuclear talks were set to resume, Iran conducted live drills in the Strait of Hormuz, a strategic waterway for oil and gas shipments.
summary_public: The day before nuclear talks were set to resume, Iran conducted live drills in the Strait of Hormuz, a strategic waterway for oil and gas shipments.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iran Holds Exercises in Strait of Hormuz After Trump Threatens Military Action
